abstract: The Swiss bank is suspected of having directly approached Belgian customers to encourage them to engage in transactions meant to evade taxes, according to Brussels prosecutors.
snippet: The Swiss bank is suspected of having directly approached Belgian customers to encourage them to engage in transactions meant to evade taxes, according to Brussels prosecutors.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — A Belgian magistrate judge is investigating whether the Swiss bank UBS engaged in fraud, money laundering and other crimes in an effort to help wealthy individuals avoid taxes, the Brussels prosecutor’s office said on Friday.

headline.main: UBS Faces Money Laundering and Fraud Inquiry in Belgium
